TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 代表在資料繫結控制項中顯示為超連結的欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a hyperlink in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 顯示的超連結，顯示每一筆記錄。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a hyperlink for each record displayed. 當使用者按一下超連結時，他或她會導向至與超連結相關的網頁中。When the user clicks a hyperlink, he or she is directed to the Web page associated with the hyperlink. 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要顯示的超連結的標題，請使用屬性。To specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks, use the property. 使用屬性來指定要在按下超連結時，瀏覽至 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink is clicked. 如果您想要顯示在特定的視窗或框架的已連結之內容，設定屬性。If you want to display the linked content in a specific window or frame, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 當和必須設定的屬性，所有的超連結物件共用相同的標題和導覽 URL。When the and properties are set, all hyperlinks in the object share the same caption and navigation URL. 同樣地，屬性亦套用於所有超連結。Likewise, the property also applies to all hyperlinks. 或者，您可以繫結資料來源中欄位的物件。Alternatively, you can bind the object to fields in a data source. 這可讓您顯示每個超連結在另一個標題物件，並讓每個超連結導覽至不同的位置。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink in the object and to have each hyperlink navigate to a different location. 若要為標題的欄位繫結，設定屬性。To bind a field to a caption, set the property. 若要建立瀏覽的 URL，設定要用來建立 URL 的欄位的逗號分隔清單的屬性。To create a URL for navigation, set the property to a comma-separated list of fields to use to create the URL. 您可以藉由設定指定標題和瀏覽 Url 的自訂格式和屬性，分別。You can specify a custom format for the captions and navigation URLs by setting the and properties, respectively. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段物件。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 若要顯示影像，而非文字標頭區段中，設定屬性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在物件藉由設定屬性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別的繫結欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要顯示或隱藏在資料繫結控制項的整個標頭區段，使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性 （如果有的話）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件，以顯示靜態中的超連結的資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of static hyperlinks in a control. 中的每一個超連結物件共用相同的標題和瀏覽 URL 所指定和屬性，分別。Each hyperlink in the object shares the same caption and navigation URL specified by the and properties, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結資料來源中欄位的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind a object to fields in a data source. 和屬性用來指定要繫結至標題和瀏覽 URL，分別顯示每個超連結的欄位物件。The and properties are used to specify the fields to bind to the caption and the navigation URL, respectively, of each hyperlink displayed in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public HyperLinkField ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: HyperLinkField();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/CS/hyperlinkfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/VB/hyperlinkfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將目前 物件的屬性複製到指定的物件。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫方法來複製目前的內容到另一個物件。The method is called by the method to copy the properties of the current object to another.

span.span: Returns a new instance of the class.
A new instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫方法建立的新執行個體類別。The method is called by the method to create a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string[] DataNavigateUrlFields { get; set; }
.property instance string[] DataNavigateUrlFields
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFields As String()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ DataNavigateUrlFields { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源中的欄位名稱，這些欄位用來建構 物件中超連結的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the object.

value.span: 包含資料來源中欄位名稱的陣列，這些欄位用來建構 物件中超連結的 URL。

span.span: An array containing the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 預設為空陣列，表示未設定 。

span.span: The default is an empty array, indicating that is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性時的資料來源包含多個欄位，必須建立的超連結的結合物件。Use the property when the data source contains multiple fields that must be combined to create the hyperlinks for the object. 在指定的欄位屬性所使用的格式字串中結合屬性來建構中的超連結物件。The fields specified in the property are combined with the format string in the property to construct the hyperlinks in the object. > [!NOTE] > 當您將屬性與宣告式程式碼在.aspx 檔案中，使用以逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱。When you set the property with declarative code in an .aspx file, use a comma-separated list of field names. 除了使用這個屬性與欄位繫結的超連結 Url，您可以使用屬性設定為靜態值的超連結 URL。Instead of using this property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlinks' URL to a static value. 使用此選項，每個超連結會共用相同的 URL。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and the properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataNavigateUrlFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataNavigateUrlFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataNavigateUrlFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定 物件中超連結之 URL 的呈現格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a object are rendered.

value.span: 字串，指定 物件中超連結之 URL 的呈現格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a are rendered.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示 URL 值未套用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂格式中的超連結的 url物件。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the hyperlinks in a object. 如果屬性未設定時，超連結的 Url 不會收到任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the hyperlinks' URLs do not get any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 格式字串套用時，才屬性設定。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含該欄位值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值: {0}"，{0} 預留位置會取代中的欄位值物件。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value in the object. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 包含兩個部分，並以分號和包裝在括號，在表單中的預留位置 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這個參數是格式化語法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0: f2}"會顯示定點包含兩個小數位數。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要套用到瀏覽的 Url 超連結顯示在自訂格式物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom format to apply to the navigation URLs of the hyperlinks displayed in a object. 所指定的欄位值屬性以查詢字串傳遞至格式字串中指定的 Web 網頁。The value of the field specified by the property is passed as a query string to a Web page specified in the format string. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextField { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextField
Public Overridable Property DataTextField As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源中的欄位名稱，這個欄位包含 物件中超連結標題所要顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source containing the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object.

value.span: 資料來源中的欄位名稱，這個欄位包含 物件中超連結標題所要顯示的值。

span.span: The name of the field from the data source containing the values to display for the hyperlink captions in the .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定包含要顯示的超連結標題的文字欄位的名稱物件。Use the property to specify the name of the field that contains the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object. 除了使用這個屬性與欄位繫結的超連結標題，您可以使用屬性設定為靜態值的超連結標題。Instead of using this property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlink captions to a static value. 使用此選項，每個超連結會共用相同的標題。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性指定繫結至超連結標題中顯示資料來源欄位物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a field from the data source to bind to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/CS/hyperlinkfielddatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/VB/hyperlinkfielddatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來格式化值的屬性繫結至超連結標題中顯示物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 值會格式化為貨幣。The values are formatted as currency. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定 物件中超連結標題的顯示格式。

span.span: Get or sets the string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a object are displayed.

value.span: 字串，指定 中超連結標題的顯示格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a are displayed.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示超連結標題未套用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the hyperlink captions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式中顯示的標題物件。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the captions displayed in the object. 如果屬性未設定，該欄位的值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 格式字串套用時，才屬性設定。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含該欄位值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字串"項目值: {0}"，{0} 預留位置取代欄位的值，當它出現在物件。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value when it is displayed in the object. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 包含兩個部分，並以分號和包裝在括號，在表單中的預留位置 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這個參數是格式化語法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串"{0: f2}"會顯示定點包含兩個小數位數。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來格式化值的屬性繫結至超連結標題中顯示物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 值會格式化為貨幣。The values are formatted as currency. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string NavigateUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string NavigateUrl
Public Overridable Property NavigateUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在按一下 物件中的超連結時所要巡覽的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 當按一下 中的超連結時，所要巡覽的 URL。

span.span: The URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的 URL 中的超連結時，瀏覽至按一下物件。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. 當設定這個屬性時，每個超連結會共用相同的瀏覽 URL。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same navigation URL. 不使用這個屬性來設定 URL 的超連結，您可以使用屬性要繫結至資料來源中欄位的超連結的 Url。Instead of using this property to set the URL for the hyperlinks, you can use the property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field in a data source. 這可讓您擁有每個超連結的不同 URL。This allows you to have a different URL for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定靜態網頁中的超連結時，瀏覽至按一下物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static Web page to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，在按一下 物件中的超連結時，這個視窗或框架會顯示連結的網頁。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 目標視窗或框架，在按一下 中的超連結時，這個視窗或框架會載入連結的網頁。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示 Web 內容會連結至超連結，在按下超連結時。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a hyperlink when that hyperlink is clicked. 值必須以字母中的 A 到 Z 範圍 （不區分大小寫） 下表中列出的特殊值除了其中每個開頭是底線開頭。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, each of which begins with an underscore. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更新版本支援`_search`目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later versions support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 屬性呈現為`target`屬性。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為物件必須是 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的網頁中的超連結相關聯內容的目標視窗物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a target window in which to display the contents of the Web page associated with a hyperlink in a object. 按一下超連結時，會在新視窗中顯示連結的 Web 網頁。The linked Web page is displayed in a new window when the hyperlink is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件中每個超連結所要顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for each hyperlink in the object.

value.span: 中每個超連結所要顯示的文字。

span.span: The text to display for each hyperlink in the .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示中的超連結的標題物件。Use the property to specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. 當設定這個屬性時，每個超連結會共用相同的標題。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same caption. 不使用這個屬性設定的超連結標題，您可以使用屬性要繫結至資料來源中欄位的超連結標題。Instead of using this property to set the hyperlink captions, you can use the property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field in a data source. 這可讓您顯示不同的標題，每個超連結。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定靜態標題中的超連結顯示物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 表示 物件所包含的控制項支援回呼。

span.span: Indicates that the controls contained by the object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫預設方法，以表示中所含控制項支援回呼的物件。The method overrides the default method to indicate that controls contained in the object support callbacks.
